snippet: An installment of Ecstatic Summer, part of the River to River Festival, featured the composers David Lang, Daniel Lopatin and William Brittelle in a program of ambient scores.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews installment of Ecstatic Summer, part of the River to River Festival, featuring ambient music works by composers David Lang, Daniel Lopatin and William Brittelle at the World Financial Center's Winter Garden.
lead_paragraph: An installment of Ecstatic Summer, part of the River to River Festival, featured the composers David Lang, Daniel Lopatin and William Brittelle in a program of ambient scores.

headline.seo: Ecstatic Summer, Part of River to River, at Winter Garden
headline.main: Sounds That Hang in the Summer Air
headline.print_headline: Sounds That Hang in the Summer Air
